title: Casimir III, Duke of Pomerania
text: Casimir or Kasimir III (IV) (1348 – 24 August 1372), oldest son of <a href="Barnim%20III%2C%20Duke%20of%20Pomerania">Barnim III</a>, was one of the <a href="Duchy%20of%20Pomerania">Dukes of Pomerania</a>-<a href="Stettin">Stettin</a> (Szczecin). He died during a campaign against the <a href="Margraviate%20of%20Brandenburg">Margraviate of Brandenburg</a> during the siege of <a href="K%C3%B6nigsberg%20%28Neumark%29">Königsberg (Neumark)</a> in 1372.
